entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 04:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1800 metres this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in wind prone areas this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight and ending before morning. Snow level 1900 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in wind prone areas early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
